subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tim Lincecum, a 170-pounder who throws 98 miles an hour, is the ace on a team that barely scores yet is still challenging for the National League wild-card berth.
snippet: Tim Lincecum, a 170-pounder who throws 98 miles an hour, is the ace on a team that barely scores yet is still challenging for the National League wild-card berth.
